item.title: Mattress has been dumped on left hand side as you go towards Barnwood, 10th January
item.description:
On grass verge been there for weeks, if not months and is now going mouldy looks awful left hand side of road as you travel up towards sainsburys
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 10th January
item.description:
Customer reports that the barriers, for a broken manhole at the location, have been up and down for several years now - they've recently gone back up. The cover belongs to BT, who are clearly not bothered about it; the damage is minimal and they feel that it is not unsafe (it's just a crack). Please can the barriers be removed/the manhole be repaired asap, as the problem has existed for some time.
Report on FixMyStreet
